title: Indian Finance Minister Sees Continued Economic Growth Momentum
description: India’s growth momentum is set to continue, and the government expects the economy to expand by at least 7% in the financial year through March, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said.
content: India’s growth momentum is set to continue, and the government expects the economy to expand by at least 7% in the financial year through March, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said.
